reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting Vietnam to meet its international climate change obligations by accelerating implementation of priority energy sector actions.

description.narrative: The project is designed to support the Government of Vietnam to accelerate the implementation of the priority energy sector actions (including policies and measures) of its Intended Nationally Determined Contribution ahead of 2020, by outlining the costs, benefits and implementation strategy for key measures that drive renewable energy and energy efficiency. This is expected to generate opportunities for international businesses, including UK ones.

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
